reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater chic and well-made, appreciating its comfort, softness, and perfect warmth for cold weather.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a Cozy Sweater!
items.body: This cable knit sweater is so comfortable - soft, oversized and very stylish. You can tuck it in, leave it untucked, wear it with a wide belt or use one of the elastic belts to crop it. It looks great paired with jeans, skirts or leggings. The sweater is thick but not bulky so layering is always an option because it isn't heavy. This sweater is now a staple in my closet because of its comfort and versatility. Read more
items.author: KK Shib

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I was skeptical but YES! Get it! So cute!
items.body: I am genuinely obsessed with this sweater. I hate trying to order clothes from Amazon because it almost never works out, and I have also never left a review for a clothing item before but I LOVE LOVE LOVE this! The shape is so stinkin cute, it’s thick and warm but also loose and airy. Fits true to size for that perfectly oversized while still flattering fit. Absolutely worth it, ordering 2 more for myself and a couple for my teen too! Read more
items.author: Meghann

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good structure to the sweater
items.body: I have two of these. Large off white, medium purple. I am 5'11, athletic build, 160. They both fit well. One star knocked off because light purple has more of a gray pink undertone. Wasn't what I was going for but keeping it. These are beautiful sweaters. Warm, bot not so bad. Just know, the arms are chunky and won't fit in just any coat. But you know that when you order. If you are on the fence, just get it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SOFT WARM HEAVY PERFECT
items.body: Height 5ft weight 210 size 2xl AMAZING SWEATER. It is heavy but te knit of of the fabric is that way as it should be especially for bell sleeves. It has plenty of room. I picked 2x or XXL and had a shirt on under and the fit was still great. I pushed the sleeves up to my elbows but they don't stay up. Not a deal breaker. It is nice warm richer orange color. You will not be cold when wearing it. I got this sweater to have real clothes for a Velma (Scooby-Doo) costume for Halloween this year and it is perfect. I would say only spot wash if it does get dirty as the fabric is already heavy and dense, and then let air dry. VERY VERY soft fabric, worth buying more than one if you need multiple sweaters for the season, it isnt a long sweater though. If you were to wear with leggings, make sure your leggings are not see through, the sweater will cover your butt, but if you beneath the waist it rides up or for me it did. Read more
items.author: Ariel Lynn McFarland

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Babes, just get it it’s like, super cute
items.body: This oversized brown sweater is the fashion equivalent of a safe emotional support boyfriend. Soft, warm, committed, and never judges you for carbs. The fabric feels quality, not disposable-fast-fashion thin. It drapes like you tried, even when you definitely did not. I’ve worn it to Target, work, and accidentally slept in it. 10/10 cozy chic. I now build outfits around this sweater like it’s the main character Read more
items.author: Jamie Sailer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice
items.body: Highly surprised at the quality and thickness of this sweater. It didn’t look that heavy in the photo, I was pleasantly impressed. The color was spot on, no variation. Fits true to size but has room to spare if you want to size down but I don’t recommend it. I don’t think there will be a problem with pelting or those little balls that you have to use a shaver for. For me, I like the style, not too over the top, might be a bit warm for indoor activities, but perfect for cool places. Considering on buying another color. Read more
items.author: History Buff

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars I was disappointed
items.body: I usually like anything I get from Pretty Garden but this was not as expected. It’s not loose as in the photo. It’s not a typical, warm cable knit sweater. It’s lighter weight than it appears in their photos, cheaper yarn. It’s soft & will look nice with a jumper or overalls so I’m going to keep it & use it for layering. Ok value. Read more
items.author: Janners

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft. Nice looking. Comfortable.
items.body: So soft. So comfortable. I love that its DESIGNED to be oversized. It looks great and is soft. I got a lot of compliments when I wore it to work the first time. Will be buying more in other colors. Nice enough to be office appropriate at a job where you need to look professional. Read more
items.author: M_F_2016

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown Coffee, Dark Khaki, Deep Brown, Beige White, Grey Blue, Apricot, Army Green, Sage Green, Black, Orange, Mist Blue, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
